headline: Dodge & Cox Balanced Fund Q2 2025 Shareholder Letter
summary: As of June 30, the Fund held 46.2% in U.S. equities, 17.9% in non-U.S. equities, and 35.9% in fixed income securities plus cash.

headline: Stocks Are Trading More Like Bitcoin. What That Means for Investors.
summary: Call-option spreads give investors a way to bet on a continuation of the bullish trend in U.S. stocks—while limiting risk.
